svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:61.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/61.0" version="9.0.9" editor="www.draw.io" type="github"><diagram id="ee4c50d1-b534-4ecd-2d82-d4290bb9d574" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

switch.text: <font style="font-size: 24px">销售产品跟踪负责制</font>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

switch.text: [Not supported by viewer]

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 25px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

switch.text: 开始

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 95px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 市场部根据合同、要货通知等通知成品库发货

switch.text: 市场部根据合同、要货通知等通知成品库发货

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 95px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: 各部门出现不持行制度，责任事故等问题，交人力资源督导部进行责任追究和处理

switch.text: 客户

switch.text: 结束
